relevant_findings.heent: Normocephalic, atraumatic, pupils equal, round, and reactive to light
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, tender to palpation in the right upper quadrant

ct_findings.lung: Small right pleural effusion with mild right basilar atelectasis; left lung base clear
ct_findings.heart: Moderate to severe cardiomegaly; no pericardial effusion
ct_findings.gallbladder: Distended with multiple layering gallstones; pericholecystic stranding noted

adrenal_glands.right: Indeterminate 1.1 cm lesion stable since prior study

ct_findings.kidneys: No hydronephrosis or stones; incompletely visualized renal cyst increased in size since prior study
ct_findings.bowel: Unremarkable without evidence of wall thickening or obstruction
ct_findings.lymph_nodes: No mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy; calcified mesenteric lymph node noted
ct_findings.osseo: No suspicious lesion; healed rib fractures of right posterior ribs 11 and 12

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The renal cyst in the lower pole of the left kidney has increased in size since the prior study.
